definitions.text: an accusation that you are responsible for some lapse or misdeed
examples: his incrimination was based on my testimony
the police laid the blame on the driver

definitions.text: a reproach for some lapse or misdeed
examples: he took the blame for it

definitions.text: put or pin the blame on

examples: Don't always pick on your little brother
We blamed the accident on her
The tragedy was charged to her inexperience
I'll be damned (or blessed or darned or goddamned) if I'll do any such thing
he's a damn (or goddam or goddamned) fool
